text: Baven is a village in the municipality of Südheide in the north of Celle in Lower Saxony, Germany. It is on the western edge of the Südheide Nature Park, on the Lüneburg Heath. == Bibliography == * Matthias Blazek: 100 Jahre organisiertes Feuerlöschwesen in Baven 1907–2007. Hermannsburg 2007 * Hartmut Rißmann (editor): Bavener Dorf-Chronik. Hermannsburg 1995 * Gerhard Röhrs (editor): Chronik Baven. Hermannsburg 1993 == Other websites == * Information about Baven == References == Category:Villages in Lower Saxony Category:Celle (district)
title: Baven
